meanings.definition: Designed to resist or prevent burglary.
meanings.sent1: The new alarm system is burglarproof and keeps our home safe.
meanings.sent2: It is important to have burglarproof locks on all the doors and windows.
meanings.sent3: The burglarproof door was so strong that even the sneaky thief couldn't break in.
meanings.sent4: Her plan was like a burglarproof fortress, impenetrable and secure.
meanings.sent5: The burglarproof safe held all the valuable jewelry without any worry of theft.

meanings.sent1: We need to burglarproof the house before going on vacation.
meanings.sent2: He decided to burglarproof the store by installing security cameras.
meanings.sent3: She tried to burglarproof her room by placing a chair under the doorknob.
meanings.sent4: The community worked together to burglarproof the neighborhood against break-ins.
meanings.sent5: The homeowner hired a professional to burglarproof the entire property.
